name: High Ground Tech | Business
description:
High Ground provides the technical understanding and support necessary to bring new and existing business practices to the 21st century with industry standard services â€” Google Suite, Slack, Invoice Ninja and more.

High Ground also builds and maintains new and existing websites. See highground.tech for more.

name: High Ground Tech | Entrepreneur
description:
For entry-level business, High Ground provides websites, e-commerce, brand consultation, logo design, and business resources.

If your new business requires a technology that is not currently on the market, High Ground provides services from idea consultation through prototyping and development.

name: High Ground Tech | Community
description:
For driven individuals ready to take their career to new heights, High Ground privides in-demand web development training, mentorship, and portfolio building.

Advanced students are provided attentive job search guidance and may be offered a position in our competitive apprenticeship program.
